sentences.sContent: But you only get the maximum benefit if you implement all of them, because their power comes from their interaction.
sentences.sContent_eng: But you only get the maximum benefit if you implement all of them, because their power comes from their interaction.
sentences.sCn: 但您只有在实现所有方法的情况下才能获得最多的收益，因为它们的力量来自于它们之间的相互作用。

trans.tranOther: a process by which two or more things affect each other
